title: College Student Financial Aid (fafsa-Pell grant, Cal grant...) is considered public charges or cash assistance?
question: College Student Financial Aid (fafsa-Pell grant, Cal grant...) is considered public charges or cash assistance for green card holders?
question_tags: Bankruptcy,Chapter 7 bankruptcy means test,Debt,Bankruptcy and debt
answers: If you qualify, those are not 'means test' benefits & you'll be OK.
It should not trigger it, so you should be ok
No, that kind of "Financial Aid" should not trigger a "Public Charge" removability and/or inadmissibility ground in your situation.
